page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES Part 2
page.content: 1.ALURKI-The person who is 'on' stands acing a corner of the yard and counts up to a certain number.The others have to hide.The 'on' person searches for them and when one is spotted shouts their name.The 'on' person and the one spotted run to the corner and the one who reaches the corner first shouts 'ALURKI'-ONE,TWO,THREE.If that person is the 'on' person then he or she becomes a 'hider' and the 'hider' becomes the 'on' person.If the 'hider' reaches the corner first then the original 'on' person remains 'on'. When there is only one 'hider' left,he or she can shout 'SAVE THE BUNCH' on reaching the corner first. 2.POISON-A marked out area is encircled by children all joining hands.At the command'GO',each person has to try to pull another or more into the area.If successful those people are out.
